casebody.head_matter:
DeAngelo et al., Appellants, v. Philadelphia Transportation Company.
Argued November 21, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Beien and Robeets, JJ.
Mark Charleston, with him Charleston é Post, for appellant.
Daniel I. Murphy, for appellee.
January 15, 1969:
